title: Real Madrid — Advanced Knowledge Quiz
description: A challenging quiz for true Madridistas. Test your deep knowledge of Real Madrid's history, tactics, players, and achievements!

questions.question: Which club did Real Madrid defeat to win their first European Cup in 1956?
questions.explanation: Real Madrid beat Stade de Reims 4–3 in the 1956 final in Paris.

questions.question: Under which manager did Real Madrid win their first La Liga title of the 21st century?
questions.explanation: Vicente del Bosque led Real Madrid to the 2000–01 La Liga title.

questions.question: In what year did the Santiago Bernabéu Stadium open?
questions.explanation: The Bernabéu opened on December 14, 1947.

questions.question: Which Real Madrid player scored a hat-trick in the 1960 European Cup Final?
questions.explanation: Puskás scored four goals in the 7–3 win over Eintracht Frankfurt.

questions.question: Which manager replaced Zinedine Zidane after his first departure in 2018?
questions.explanation: Julen Lopetegui was appointed in 2018, just before the World Cup.

questions.question: Which Real Madrid goalkeeper won the FIFA Best Goalkeeper Award in 2018?
questions.explanation: Keylor Navas was named the best goalkeeper after the 2017–18 season.

questions.question: How many goals did Cristiano Ronaldo score in the 2013–14 Champions League season?
questions.explanation: Ronaldo scored a record 17 goals that campaign.

questions.question: Which Real Madrid player has won the most Champions League titles with the club?
questions.explanation: Paco Gento won 6 European Cups between 1956–1966.

questions.question: Which Real Madrid manager was dismissed after winning the Champions League?
questions.explanation: Vicente del Bosque was sacked after winning La Liga and the Champions League in 2003.

questions.question: Which Real Madrid player provided the assist for Bale’s bicycle kick goal in the 2018 UCL Final?
questions.explanation: Marcelo crossed the ball that Bale converted with a spectacular bicycle kick.

questions.question: Who was Real Madrid’s top scorer during the 2007–08 La Liga title-winning season?
questions.explanation: Ruud van Nistelrooy led with 16 goals despite injury struggles.

questions.question: Which Real Madrid player has captained both Real Madrid and his national team to major trophies?
questions.explanation: Iker Casillas captained Spain to Euro 2008, World Cup 2010, and Euro 2012 victories.

questions.question: During José Mourinho’s tenure (2010–2013), Real Madrid set a La Liga record of how many points?
questions.explanation: Madrid reached 100 points in the 2011–12 season, a then-record.

questions.question: Which player scored the decisive penalty in the 2016 Champions League Final?
questions.explanation: Cristiano Ronaldo converted the winning penalty in the shootout vs Atlético Madrid.

questions.question: Who was the Real Madrid president before Florentino Pérez’s return in 2009?
questions.explanation: Ramón Calderón was president from 2006 to early 2009.

questions.question: Which Real Madrid player holds the record for most appearances in club history?
questions.explanation: Iker Casillas made over 725 appearances for the club.

questions.question: Which player joined Real Madrid in 2009 along with Cristiano Ronaldo and Benzema?
questions.explanation: Kaká, Ronaldo, and Benzema all joined during the 2009 summer window.

questions.question: Which Real Madrid midfielder scored from a corner kick in a Champions League match?
questions.explanation: Toni Kroos famously scored directly from a corner vs Valencia in the 2019 Supercopa.

questions.question: Real Madrid's ‘BBC’ trio consisted of which three players?
questions.explanation: BBC = Benzema, Bale, Cristiano Ronaldo — the lethal trio of the 2010s.

questions.question: Which player scored the fastest goal in Real Madrid’s Champions League history?
questions.explanation: Rodrygo scored after just 14 seconds vs Manchester City in 2020.
